threads.body:
Your trial will end on Tuesday, June 20, 2023.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

Your trial is ending—sign up to extend your trial

You have a trial that will expire on June 20, 2023.

Public preview availability for Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management is extended into 2023. We’re inviting public preview customers to ensure continued access to premium features by signing up for a new free 180-day trial.
Sign up here >

If you don’t purchase a new subscription by June 20, 2023, your trial data will be available to all people in your organization for about 30 days. At that time, the subscription status changes to Disabled, and only admins will have access to trial data for about another 90 days. After that, your trial is permanently deleted.

Your trial that will expire:
Product Total licenses Start date
Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management Extended Public Preview Trial 1000000 December 20, 2022

Additional information

  • How to extend a trial.
  • How to cancel a trial.

Account information

Organization name: High Purity New England

Expiration date June 20, 2023

Privacy Statement

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, ​Redmond, WA 98052​

subject: Extend your trial to keep using your product
